description: ERECTION OF PART SINGLE/PART TWO STOREY EXTENSIONS AT THE REAR OF NOS.8 10 & 12; A TWO STOREY EXTENSION AT THE SIDE OF NO. 12 AND A SINGLE STOREY EXTENSION AT SIDE OF NO. 8.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The garage(s) and/or car parking space(s) shown on the approved drawing garages shall be provided before commencement of the use of the land or building(s) hereby permitted and thereafter shall be kept free from obstruction and shall not be used for purposes other than the parking of vehicles in conjunction with the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 3 - Before the building/extension hereby permitted is first occupied, the windows in the extensions elevation of the shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - The extensions and works hereby permitted shall be carried out as a single building operation to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.  Reason for condition:To protect the amenities of occupiers of the houses hereby permitted.
